title: Trainers Team
description: I worked with ElitesXTech on a project for Trainers Team Academy for Consultations and Training, collaborating closely with General Manager Mostafa Sabry. As part of a team, I worked with Nour Mousa (Operation Manager) and Sharaf Mansour (CTO and Software Architect). My primary responsibilities included creating a comprehensive database using MySql and developing a full-stack website using PHP, complete with an admin panel for efficient data management. Throughout the project, I attended weekly and monthly meetings with the Operation Manager, CTO, and General Manager to provide progress updates on milestones and obtain necessary approvals. I dedicated 100 hours to this project.
authors: Fayez Kassem, Sharaf Mansour, NourEldin Mousa, Mostafa Sabry

title: Khattab Trading and Shipping Company
description: I worked with ElitesXTech to create the website with sveltekit that has an Arabic/English support with animation

title: Fitness Tracker Web App
description: I worked with ElitesXTech interns on Fitness Tracker Web App to Calculate calorie intake As an Associate Trainer Along side with Sharaf Mansour to instruct them on Blazor, C# and ASP.NET.
authors: Fayez Kassem, Ahmed Walid, Ahmed Khalil, Salma Alaa, Sharaf Mansour, NourEldin Mousa

title: Fitness Tracker Class Library
description: I collaborated with ElitesXTech interns on the Fitness Tracker Class Library to calculate calorie intake, serving as an Associate Trainer alongside Sharaf Mansour. In this role, I provided instruction on Blazor, C#, and ASP.NET.  The class library was successfully published on NuGet, amassing a total of 129 downloads.
authors: Fayez Kassem, Ahmed Walid, Ahmed Khalil, Salma Alaa, Sharaf Mansour

title: Lung Disease Prediction
description: For our graduation project, we trained an AI model to detect respiratory diseases and implemented it in an API used by both a website and a mobile app.

title: Advice Generator
description: This is a solution to the Advice generator app challenge on Frontend Mentor. but this solution contains an extra function that makes the first advice that appears to the user the same all day (advice of the day) and gets random advice after that.

title: Rock Paper Scissors Game
description: Just a little game to pass the time.

title: Real-Time Chat
description: This project involved implementing authentication and Firestore from Firebase and optimizing the application as a Progressive Web App (PWA), allowing it to be installed as a desktop or mobile application

title: Web Scraper
description: As a training task at ElitesXTech, I developed a C# script to download images from any Facebook page.
